mapper.select: /** tokenDAO.getTokenListCnt **/ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM token_request WHERE MEMBER_IDX = #{MEMBERIDX}

/** tokenDAO.getTokenList **/ SELECT TOKEN_REQUEST_IDX, MEMBER_IDX, REQUEST_POINT, CHANGE_TOKEN, WALLET_ADDRESS, STATUS_CODE, REG_IDX, DATE_FORMAT(REG_DT, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i') AS REG_DT, EDIT_IDX, DATE_FORMAT(EDIT_DT, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i') AS EDIT_DT FROM hnb.token_request WHERE MEMBER_IDX = #{MEMBERIDX} ORDER BY TOKEN_REQUEST_IDX DESC LIMIT #{PAGESTART}, #{PAGEBLOCK}
